ComicInfo.Series: Criminal Macabre: The Big Bleed Out
ComicInfo.Summary: Steve Niles! Enraptured by his Vampire mistress, Cal McDonald spirals out of control as Mo'Lock tangles with monsters and bodies begin walking out of morgues on their own.
